Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Lekythos
Description: Lekythos with a globular body, ring base and a tall narrow neck, bordered by a high lip with a round opening. The exterior surface is S-shaped. A handle connects the neck with the shoulder. Throwing marks are highly visible on the exterior.
